name: The Pink Angel
description: Mezcal provides a slightly smoky note and an element of surprise to this cocktail created by Will Noland of Brooklyn’s Sidecar. He named it after what he considers ‘‘the greatest transvestite-biker-exploitation movie of all time,’’ not just its pretty color.
recipeIngredient: 1/2	 ounce mezcal (something not too smoky, like a Fidencio Clásico)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large wineglass about three-quarters full with ice.
Add ingredients, and garnish with a lemon twist.
